name: After the Fall (itch) (Shagar220)
description:
After the Fall is a grid combat turned based game, mixed with a deck building game. Use the characteristics of the three companions Arwelin, Broon and Filice to win challenges, climb the pit and fill your deck to overcome more challenges until defeating the demon lord who threw you there.

The project is still a prototype (see second prototype) About me

I am a developer currently playing with Unity to create games in my free time.

If you want to reach me, please use the comments below.
